StatusVariable.Name: State
StatusVariable.Description: Get PM state to Tool Control

StatusVariable.Name: RecipeName
StatusVariable.Description: Get selected Recipe name to Tool Control

StatusVariable.Name: ReadyForProcess
StatusVariable.Description: Get state if PM is ready for for Processing

StatusVariable.Name: RecipeActive
StatusVariable.Description: Get state if recipe is currently running

StatusVariable.Name: PMAcquisitionProgress_SubstID
StatusVariable.Description: Substrate ID of material that its acquisition is in progress

StatusVariable.Name: PMComputationProgress_SubstID
StatusVariable.Description: Substrate ID of material that its computing is in progress
